cast.name: 马尔古扎塔·佩尔泽斯卡 Malgorzata Pieczynska
玛利亚·帕库尔尼斯 Maria Pakulnis
托马什·萨普里克 Tomasz Sapryk
扬·海恩凯维奇 Jan Hrynkiewicz
雅各布·加绍夫斯基 Jakub Gasowski

introduction: "Dewajtis" is one of Maria Rodziewiczówna's best-known moral novels, written in 1889. In seven episodes of the series about love, honor and family, the fate of a backwater and manor community, whose life was changed by the January Uprising, intertwines. The dying father's order imposes a new duty on young Marek Czertwan - he is to take care of the Poswicie estate, left by his father's missing friend, the insurgent magnate Kazimierz Orwid. How will Marek, forced to take care of the estate in Poswicie, cope with the new situation? Will he succumb to the charm of Irena, the rightful heiress of the manor? The heroes' ideals will be put to a severe test, and their desires will come into conflict with the obligations imposed by the family. The title Dewajtis, an ancient oak, casts a soothing shadow over the estate, which becomes a kind of escape from the hardships of life for the characters and a majestic symbol of intergenerational community.
